instruction: Generate a paragraph of conversational English.
output: I was just talking with my friend about how crazy the world is right now. We were discussing the changes that have taken place ever since the pandemic began and how we still have no idea when it will end. It's like everything just stopped and all that's left is uncertainty. We both agreed that it's been a trying time, but still, we both find solace in the fact that we still have each other.
